description: Deus Ex is coming back with a remaster. The 25-year-old game is getting a fresh coat of paint from Aspyr and Eidos-Montréal, upgrading many elements while keeping the gameplay the same. Read more...
title: Aspyr unveils Deus Ex Remastered, says it will keep the original's DNA intact

description: Sony is preparing to launch the Pulse Elevate wireless speaker that it says can replace wearing a headset, even when communicating with teammates. Read more...
title: Pulse Elevate is Sony's new wireless speaker built for gaming on PlayStation 5 and PC

description: God of War is turning 20, and Sony is releasing a brand-new DualSense PlayStation 5 controller to match. Read more...
title: Sony unveils God of War-themed limited edition DualSense controller

description: The next game from Housemarque, Saros, just received its first gameplay trailer showing off the sci-fi roguelike action that should be familiar to Returnal fans. Read more...
title: Returnal developer's new roguelike Saros gets a March launch date, first gameplay is here

description: Players will be going all across the world while fighting a major global threat in Battlefield 6's single-player campaign. It has a new squad mechanic to control teammates too. Read more...
title: Battlefield 6 campaign trailer reveals plenty of destruction and the protagonists

description: Marvel's Wolverine from the Spider-Man developer Insomniac Games just received a gameplay trailer, revealing just how much carnage Logan is able to dish out. Read more...
title: Insomniac's Wolverine game gets a gameplay trailer, confirms visceral combat

description: At the Snapdragon Summit, Qualcomm unveiled the X2 Elite and X2 Extreme processors for the next-generation PCs with Arm chips. Read more...
title: Qualcomm unveils X2 Elite and Extreme processors for next-gen PCs with Arm chips

description: The next Xbox game receiving a PlayStation port has been revealed to be Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and it will even gain PlayStation VR2 support. Read more...
title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 announced for PlayStation 5 with PS VR2 support

description: LG is offering a massive discount on one of its UltraGear ultra-wide OLED monitors, saving you nearly half of its price. Read more...
title: This big ultra-wide OLED monitor from LG is now nearly half the price

description: Gain the world's best ideas in a nutshell! Get 15-minute reads of the best books based on your goals and needs. Read more...
title: Deal Alert: Headway Premium now 80% off for only $60

description: There were reports that iPhone 17 Pro devices caught too many scratches. Apple has responded to the 'scratchgate' concerns. Read more...
title: Apple responds to 'scratchgate' concerns on iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max

description: This book is designed for mastering prompt engineering in artificial intelligence, focusing on ChatGPT, GPT-4, and GPT plug-ins. Read more...
title: Last chance: Prompt Engineering Using ChatGPT eBook (worth $49.99) now free

description: Google has launched its Search Live feature in the US. The search giant said you don't need an opt-in to use the feature in AI Mode. Read more...
title: Google Search Live launches in the US, no opt-in required

description: Microsoft has made a seemingly minor but what it claims to be a "significant" change for certain customers using Office apps. Read more...
title: Microsoft is making a very subtle color change in Office apps

description: Google announced that users in more than three dozen countries can now use its lower-cost AI subscription tier. Read more...
title: Google expands its AI Plus premium subscription to more countries

description: The 40-inch Samsung Odyssey G7 (G75F) Curved Gaming Monitor is still selling at its all-time low price. Read more...
title: 40-inch Samsung Odyssey G7 Curved Gaming Monitor is still at lowest price

description: Mark Zuckerberg says Instagram now has 3 billion monthly active users, roughly one-third of the population on Earth. Read more...
title: Instagram joins the 3 billion monthly active club alongside Facebook and WhatsApp

description: Oxide Games has released the Revolutions update to Ara: History Untold, bringing in new features like Culture, Influence, Agitators, and more to the 4X strategy game. Read more...
title: Ara: History Untold v2.0 Revolutions update out now with new Culture and Agitator systems

description: Rufus 4.10 is now publicly available as a stable release, which introduces dark mode support, important updates to Secure Boot, and more. Read more...
title: Rufus 4.10 is out with dark mode, new Secure Boot certificates support, and more

description: Microsoft has ditched OpenAI exclusivity in its Microsoft 365 Copilot suite, also offering Anthropic models for customers who want them. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot is ditching OpenAI exclusivity for Anthropic's models

description: In a surprising move, Starbreeze has introduced a DLC subscription program for its hit cooperative heisting game from 2013, Payday 2. Read more...
title: 12 years after launch, Payday 2 is getting a subscription service offering all DLC packs

description: Microsoft has unveiled new Xbox controllers that are themed after the upcoming Ninja Gaiden 4. These offer additional customization options via the Xbox Design Lab as well. Read more...
title: Ninja Gaiden 4-themed Xbox Wireless Controller unveiled for $95

description: AI is changing the game for programming languages. According to a new report, Python holds the top spot while JavaScript drops. The reason? "Vibe coding" with AI assistants. Read more...
title: AI's impact on programming language popularity revealed

description: Micron's Crucial T700 2TB PCIe Gen5 NVMe SSD with heatsink is currently priced the lowest, making it an excellent buy. Read more...
title: 2TB Crucial T700 Gen5 NVMe 2280 SSD with heatsink is at all time low price

description: Logitech has just announced its new Signature Slim Solar+ K980 keyboard, and it's even ditching the USB port to simply charge via light. Read more...
title: Logitech's new Solar+ K980 keyboard charges with "any light", ditches USB port

description: OpenAI and SAP are coming together to bring advanced AI technology safely and responsibly to Germany's public sector. Read more...
title: OpenAI partners with SAP to boost AI adoption in Germany's public sector

description: Just days before launch, Gearbox has delayed the Switch 2 version of Borderlands 4, saying that it needs more time to polish the experience on the Nintendo handheld. Read more...
title: Borderlands 4 on Nintendo Switch 2 gets delayed indefinitely, pre-orders cancelled

description: Riley Walz, a San Francisco-based software developer, created a web app that tracks parking enforcement officers issuing tickets in near real-time using publicly available city data. Read more...
title: 22-year-old dev creates web app that tracks San Francisco traffic cops using public data

description: At a Qualcomm event, Google and the chipmaker teased that Android is coming to the PC. Qualcomm's CEO said he has seen the software and can't wait to use it full-time. Read more...
title: Google's Android for PC platform teased by Qualcomm CEO

description: LinkedIn has cautioned users about its upcoming ToS update which includes the use of your data to serve better ads and train AI models. Read more...
title: Microsoft will soon use your LinkedIn data to train AI and serve better ads

description: Yakuza 3 is getting the Kiwami remake treatment, with Sega today announcing a new combo package that will also include a brand-new prequel campaign. Read more...
title: Sega unveils Yakuza Kiwami 3 remake and new prequel Dark Ties for 2026

description: This gaming PC deal is hard to ignore. A high-performance rig with an RTX 5070 Ti is now $700 off. It's a great way to level up your setup. Read more...
title: Amazing deal on Acer gaming PC with a powerful RTX 5070 Ti

description: Microsoft has released a new update for PowerToys to address a missing vcruntime dependency error that blocked installations. Read more...
title: Microsoft fixes PowerToys install errors in another new v0.94.2 update

description: A materials scientist consulted by iFixit explains the real reason behind the iPhone 17 Pro's scratches. Read more...
title: iFixit's teardown of Apple iPhone 17 Pro reveals 'real' culprit behind 'scratchgate'

description: Microsoft has announced the general availability of Windows ML, a framework first previewed at Build 2025, to simplify the development of on-device AI applications. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces general availability of Windows ML for developers

description: Scientists have found that heating gold beyond a level of degree unexpectedly broke a fundamental law of nature. Read more...
title: Super-heating gold unexpectedly breaks a fundamental law of Universe

description: The Stargate Project has announced five new locations for its massive AI data center build-out in the United States. Read more...
title: OpenAI announces five new AI data center sites for Stargate Project
